About Me

A few things about me

BIO

I began self studying programming for automation 2 years ago. The language in which I took the plunge was python 3+. I then began to attain an interest in web development and applications. This introduced me to Django a python web framework. This in turn forced me to learn Html, CSS, SCSS, Javascript, and Jquery. My fascination grew knowing anything I could think of can come to life which is driving me to learn as much as possible and continue to learn from the mistakes that I make!

Django (framework)

Full Stack Developer

Proficient with this framework. Creating websites from scratch Deep understanigng of CRUD (Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete).

Python

Programmer

From webscraping to automation, even a little bit of data analysis. Fast learner willing to learn any language to get the task done!

UI and UX

Developing UI and UX is a driven passion of mine. Always looking for new innovative ways to improve my knowledge. Giving the user a pleasant experience is a must for me.
